ModMetaData.name: Legacy Ark
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Deep in rimspace, a science vessel was recently discovered. An ark vault containing thousands upon thousands of tissue samples from earth that was. Now that glitterworld bioengineers have gotten their hands on them, old earth species are once again seeding far off words.
So far they have reanimated a lot of cattle and are now working on different types of sheep. A badger and a gerbil has also been sighted as well as some sort of bird. These animals can be bought of traders although some has spread to the wild in some areas.
--- Info --- Continuation of lindseyries mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=857283007 The animals saved from that version is - Merino Sheep - Highland Cow The rest is found in the AnimalCollabProj-mod
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/LegacyArk
